price: Rahman’ın kulları, yeryüzünde alçak gönüllü olarak yürürler. Cahiller kendilerine laf attıklarında ise “Selam!” deyip geçerler.
arabic: وَعِبَادُ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ ٱلَّذِينَ يَمۡشُونَ عَلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ هَوۡنٗا وَإِذَا خَاطَبَهُمُ ٱلۡجَٰهِلُونَ قَالُواْ سَلَٰمٗا

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waʿibādu al-raḥmāni alladhīna yamshūna ʿalā al-arḍi hawnan wa-idhā khāṭabahumu al-jāhilūna qālū salāman
